description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education and knowledge sharing through innovative digital ecosystems. His work spans from exploring decentralized internet futures to applying ecosystem architecture principles in various domains. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics like internet fragmentation, regenerative design, and collaborative innovation, reflecting his passion for creating impactful and inclusive digital spaces. He advocates for aligning technology with human values and embracing diversity in the digital landscape.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to innovate in education and digital spaces. Based in Taipei, he explores decentralized futures and applies ecosystem principles to create inclusive, value-driven online communities.
